item.title: Packaged food, FMCG players say GST rationalisation will boost consumer sentiment, spur demand revival

review.headline_rewrite: Packaged food, FMCG players say GST rationalisation will boost consumer sentiment, spur demand revival
bullets: FMCG and packaged food companies said that the move to slash GST on a wide basket of food items and essential personal care products
Equally impactful are reductions on personal care and hygiene staples such as soaps, shampoos, toothpaste and detergents from 18 per cent to 5 per
This is GST acting as an enabler of macroeconomic support: stimulating consumption, expanding rural demand, and aligning tax policy with inclusivity.”
